vulnerabilities.description: Entry point function lacks input validation. No checks for empty values, bounds, or malicious input.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add validation: require!() checks, is_empty(), bounds checking. Validate addresses with addr_validate(). Check amounts > 0.

vulnerabilities.description: External call before state update. Vulnerable to cross-contract reentrancy attacks.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Follow checks-effects-interactions pattern. Update all state BEFORE external calls/messages.
